question: Amazonia 1 satellite, which was making news recently, belongs to which country?
explanation:
The ISROâ€™s 53rd space mission using the PSLV C51 rocket will launch Amazonia-1 as the primary satellite.
This satellite belongs to Brazil. In addition, the launch vehicle will also carry 18 co-passenger payloads. The rocket would be launched from Sriharikota spaceport in Andhra Pradesh.
